title: Kingdom of the Holy Sun
description:
About
Psychedelia or the search for altered perception of visual and auditory experiences in all forms of human activity
Biography
Formed in early 2012 in Seattle, WA, Kingdom of the Holy Sun offers their twist on psychedelia , by drawing on such genres as the melodic and fuzzed out sounds of garage rock from the 60Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s, meditative drones and instrumentation from the Indian Sub-continent, as well as the more recent sounds of neo- psychedelia. Influences	PRESS:
mr. atavist:
Shoe-hazy sounds from SeattleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Kingdom of the Holy SunÃ¢â‚¬Â¦If you dig Brian Jonestown Massacre, Sisters of Your Sunshine Vapor and the like then grab a seat on the throne and put on the sunscreen. Kingdom of the Holy Sun was a recent valis Pick of the Week for good reason.


Valis Pick of the Week
Hailing from the Pacific Northwest, land of the birch stands and all which accompanies it, are Kingdom of the Holy Sun! Their self-titled album, released on New Year's Eve and the dawn of 2012, is a 14-track trip through the woody & wooly areas of your mind. Highly recommended!


Current Location	Seattle, WA, USA
